protocol.text: The data were analyzed with GeneSpring software version 11.5.1 using RMA (Robust Multichip Averaging) with quantile normalization method. Baseline was set to median for all samples. The other parameters were left as default. Probe intensity values are represented in log scale. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA-calculated signal intensity value

Wild-type and various mutant Arabidopsis seeds were surface sterilized and plated on Murashige and Skoog medium supplemented with 0.8% Bactoagar (Difco) and 1% sucrose. The plates were then cold treated at 4 degrees Celsius for 4 days and transferred to light chambers maintained at 22 degrees Celsius with 20 micromol per meter square per second light intensities.
Total RNA was extracted from the harvested seedlings using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Quiagen, CA) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated labelled aRNA were prepared from total RNA using the GeneChip 3' IVT Express kit (Affymetrix) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

12.5 micrograms fragmented and labelled aRNA were hybridised for 16 hr at 45 degrees Celsius to Arabidopsis Affymetrix ATH1 Arrays. Arrays were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
Stained and washed arrays were scanned using GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G (Affymetrix) controlled by GeneChip Operating Software (GCOS).
